thread.section_title: Hotel Nord Nuova Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Stayed in January with my family
thread.title_full: Stayed in January with my family - Review of Hotel Nord Nuova Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Caroline K
title: Stayed in January with my family
text:
The hotel is close to main train terminal in Rome and close to Hop On & Off bus stops; staff are very helpful and breakfast a good start to the day.
View from our rooms was really nice.
Note whilst told transport would be the same prices a taxi if the Hotel organised it -it was more expensive.
I would recommend staying here.
